messages.content: What is the purpose of ComfyUI_InterpolateEverything?
ComfyUI_InterpolateEverything is a custom node for interpolating between various elements in the Stable Diffusion ComfyUI, such as poses and line-art.
What functionality does ComfyUI_InterpolateEverything currently provide?

ComfyUI_InterpolateEverything currently provides the ability to interpolate poses using the 'Interpolate Poses' node, which creates a preprocessed ControlNet OpenPose input midway between two input images.
What future features are planned for ComfyUI_InterpolateEverything?

Planned future features for ComfyUI_InterpolateEverything include interpolating line-art using motion interpolation to create line-art ControlNet inputs midway between two input images, as well as potential additional features.
What is a prerequisite for installing ComfyUI_InterpolateEverything?
Before installing ComfyUI_InterpolateEverything, you need to install https://github.com/Fannovel16/comfyui_controlnet_aux if you haven't already.
To install ComfyUI_InterpolateEverything, first install comfyui_controlnet_aux, then clone the ComfyUI_InterpolateEverything repository into the 'custom_nodes' directory of your ComfyUI installation.
What should you do if ComfyUI_InterpolateEverything fails to load?
If ComfyUI_InterpolateEverything fails to load, it is likely because comfyui_controlnet_aux is not installed. Make sure to install it before using ComfyUI_InterpolateEverything.
Where should you clone the ComfyUI_InterpolateEverything repository during installation?
During installation, you should clone the ComfyUI_InterpolateEverything repository into the 'custom_nodes' directory of your ComfyUI installation.
